errors.error_description: Installation section specifies incompatible version constraint - installing aiogram-dialog v1.9.0 which only works with aiogram v2.x, but the README states v2.x supports aiogram v3.x
Installation section incorrectly states the package is only compatible with aiogram v2.x when the version status clearly indicates v2.x supports aiogram v3.x
correction_candidates: Note that this package requires Python 3.8+ and is compatible with aiogram v3.x.
Note that this package requires Python 3.7+ and is compatible with aiogram v2.x and v3.x.
Note that this package requires Python 3.9+ and is only compatible with aiogram v3.x.
Note that this package requires Python 3.8+ and works with both aiogram v2.x and v3.x depending on the aiogram-dialog version.
errors.golden_answer: Note that this package requires Python 3.8+ and is compatible with aiogram v3.x.
